# KAG Retirement Project - Copilot Instructions

This workspace contains HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python files for web development and scripting.

## Project Structure
- `src/` - Frontend files (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
- `scripts/` - Python scripts and utilities
- `index.html` - Main entry point

## Development Guidelines
- Use HTML5 semantic markup
- Follow CSS best practices for styling
- Write clean, modular JavaScript
- Use Python for backend scripting and utilities
